text: The 1982 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy was the 4th edition of the Hockey Champions Trophy, an international men's field hockey tournament. It took place from 6 June to 13 June in Amstelveen, Netherlands. The Netherlands won the tournament for the second time in a row by finishing first in the round- robin tournament. ==Results== ===Pool=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final standings== # # # # # # ==External links== *Official FIH website Category:Champions Trophy (field hockey) Champions Trophy Hockey Champions Trophy Category:International field hockey competitions hosted by the Netherlands Category:Sports competitions in Amstelveen Hockey Champions Trophy
